title: mcmmo十倍权限是什么
author: n1529905750
txt_content: 帖子只到四倍 十倍该怎么给

replies.author: 天辉胡萝卜
replies.txt_content:
mcmmo.perks.xp.customboost.<skillname>

需要修改experience.yml

    # XP earned by players with the permission mcmmo.perks.xp.customboost.<skillname> will get multiplied
    # with 1.25 by default, resulting in a 25% XP boost
    Custom_XP_Perk:
        Boost: 1.25
复制代码

上面的boost就是倍数值

replies.author: n1529905750
replies.txt_content:
疾风暗影 发表于 2020-3-18 01:46
mcmmo.perks.xp.customboost.

需要修改experience.yml
不带技能名称就是所有技能了对么
